message.body: Hey Lauren is Anna from ########## I have a tree trunk that needs to be fired but there's no space on the kiln shelf and it's very delicate so I left it on my
When you fire it you'll have to take it off the stand and basically set it upside down ... It balances we checked a few times I'm really sorry I can't be there
to load the kilns but Daneka said she was going to come in and would help you with
I just wanted to text you to make sure it is okay and that you don't mind doing that for me I really need to have it in the kiln if possible because I'm
planning on doing some complicated glazing with it
alright, that sounds fine, thanks for letting me know!
Of course sorry for the complicated and annoying request I really appreciate it though
no probs. have a good break!
